overview:
Aaron Hastings is a Front-End and PHP Developer with experience working for and advising companies ranging from very early stage startups to Fortune 500 companies.

He was born and started his career on the east coast, working as a contract performance engineer for companies such as the State of Connecticut, Priceline, and Fidelity Investments. He later moved to the Bay Area and worked for several years for eBay - placing in the Skunkworks ‘09 development competition - and Yahoo, where his team won the Jerry Fund for a dynamic, user-customizable post/ad submission tool that he developed the UI for. He also worked for and served as a technical advisor to charity-oriented startups H.U.M.A.N. Healthy Vending and The Voice For Good Project.
